content:
published in star puritan book no 132 *the famous puritan® book iii* by american thread company mid to late 1950s **materials ** * the famous puritan mercerized crochet cotton article 40 25 balls white ecru or cream *or* * the famous puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 63 balls silver spangle or color of your choice * steel crochet hook no 7 **gauge ** each motif measures about 3-1/2 inches x 3-1/2 inches 8 9 cm x 8 9 cm
**finished size ** approximately 52 x 70 inches 132 x 178 cm 300 motifs in a 15 x 20 arrangement
